title: Inquiry-Based Science DIY Kit Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment for developing language-integrated science education materials. Involves creating and utilizing DIY kits to promote inquiry-based learning in resource-limited settings.

learning_goals: Learners can create DIY kits explaining scientific concepts through everyday language materials via scientific inquiry processes
Learners present scientific principles that can be explained to peers for over 10 minutes using science kits developed by their team
Learners can create self/peer assessment forms to evaluate scientific communication competencies based on project outcomes

resources: Basic science tools (rulers, scissors, tape, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
